explanation: [0-0] On an open-air platform, a man in a black shirt and blue jeans bends over, holding a white object in his hand. He leans slightly forward, looking down, at a row of red and white soda cans with blue decorations placed on a red platform in front of him. A man in a red short-sleeved shirt and a red hat stands behind the man in the black shirt, holding a white piece of paper. Behind them is a tall yellowish wall.

[0-9] Then the man in the red short-sleeved shirt moves slightly to the right, and the man in the black short-sleeved shirt tightens his grip on the white object in his hand. He starts swinging his arm, quickly smashing his fist into the soda cans in front of him one by one. Some of the cans are smashed, spraying white foam and liquid, and the man in the red short-sleeved shirt leans back to avoid it. The cans that are not smashed remain on the red platform.
